verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Bow down <S%H5186><s%> thine ear, <S%H241><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>

Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am holy: <S%H2623><s%> O thou <S%H859><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that trusteth <S%H982><s%> in thee. <S%H413><s%>
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me, O Lord: <S%H136><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee daily. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of thy servant: <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> art good, <S%H2896><s%> and ready to forgive; <S%H5546><s%> and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> them that call upon <S%H7121><s%> thee.
Give ear, <S%H238><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> unto my prayer; <S%H8605><s%> and attend <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call upon <S%H7121><s%> thee: for <S%H3588><s%> thou wilt answer <S%H6030><s%> me.
Among the gods <S%H430><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like unto thee, <S%H3644><s%> O Lord; <S%H136><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> are there any works like unto thy works. <S%H4639><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, O Lord; <S%H136><s%> and shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art great, <S%H1419><s%> and doest <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things: <S%H6381><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art God <S%H430><s%> alone. <S%H905><s%>

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy way, <S%H1870><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in thy truth: <S%H571><s%> unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> thy name. <S%H8034><s%>

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my heart: <S%H3824><s%> and I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> is thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> me: and thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> hell. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7585><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and the assemblies <S%H5712><s%> of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought after <S%H1245><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> and have not <S%H3808><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thee before <S%H5048><s%> them.

But thou, <S%H859><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> art a God <S%H410><s%> full of compassion, <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> longsuffering, <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%> and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

O turn <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me; give <S%H5414><s%> thy strength <S%H5797><s%> unto thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of thine handmaid. <S%H519><s%>

Show <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> me a token <S%H226><s%> for good; <S%H2896><s%> that they which hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> hast helped <S%H5826><s%> me, and comforted <S%H5162><s%> me.
